content.p: The Students' Union (SU) is here to make sure you get everything you want out of your time at university â€“ whether that means getting involved in societies, volunteering, campaigning for change or making use of our help and support services. Our SU offers something for everyone, with: Our SU also has a full time Postgraduate Officer who represents students at central University Committees by using feedback provided by postgraduate representatives on each program. You can find the Students' Union in the Portland Building on University Park Campus. How to apply Fees and funding
